entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to rain showers near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm except 4 cm near Lake Cowichan. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
